pre-commit.description: Run all quality checks before committing
pre-commit.command: bash -c 'set -e && uv run ruff format --check . && uv run ruff check src tests && uv run mypy src && uv run pytest tests/unit/test_parser.py tests/integration/test_cli.py -v'
pre-commit.failure_message: ❌ Pre-commit checks failed. Run 'just check && just smoke' to see details.

user-prompt-submit.description: Remind Claude about code quality standards
user-prompt-submit.command: echo '✅ Remember: Always run tests after code changes. Use just check && just test-unit for quick validation.'
